text: "A Matter of Trust" is a 1986 song by Billy Joel and is the second single from his 10th studio album The Bridge. It went to number 3 in Australia, Poland and South Africa, number 10 in the United States, number 15 in Canada, number 48 in New Zealand and number 52 in the United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: A Matter of Trust
